author: HIMANSHU
article:
A summary is a text that is produced from one or more texts, that conveys important 
information in the original text, containing a significant portion of the information from the 
original text(s), and that is no longer than half of the original text. The goal of automatic text 
summarization is presenting the source text into a shorter version with meaningful semantics. 
The most important advantage of using a summary is it reduces the reading time. 
Summarization process involves interpretation, transformation and generation.
